root.name: crop()
root.description:
Crops the frame coming in from the camera. It is common for cameras add lines to the top or bottom of an image, and this function can be useful for removing them.

The parameters are intepreted differently, based on the current imageMode(). For example, imageMode(CENTER) will change x and y to define the center of the image. Using imageMode(CORNERS) will intepret the width and height parameters as the x and y values of the opposite corner of the image.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the image

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the image

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: width to display the image

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: width to display the image
